name: Collect 3D (Minigame 18)
description:
Minigame 18 | 2021-02-26

  • Made during a 3-hour Friday evening stream (my minigame streams are less frequent now, but I might do it occasionally; follow me on Twitch to catch my next minigame stream). I did come back the next day to make depth sorting work better, and I made it so you wrap the screen; but most of the work was within the 3 hours.
  • Written in JavaScript and C99 compiled to WASM (learn how you can do this with a simplified example here).
  • Keyboard, touch, and gamepad support.

Play on joshpowlison.com/minigames and log in with your Twitch account to compete for high scores and use your avatar from my channel!
